project.name: Skritter HTML5: Documentation
project.description: Learn to Write Chinese and Japanese Characters

Storage.name: Storage
Storage.author: Joshua McFarland
Storage.description:
A data adapter for IndexedDB which uses the a jQuery plugin written by nparashuram.
It extends the Storage class to get the generic database structure and version.
https://github.com/axemclion/jquery-indexeddb/

IndexedDBAdapter.name: IndexedDBAdapter
IndexedDBAdapter.description:
A data adapter for IndexedDB which uses the a jQuery plugin written by nparashuram.
It extends the Storage class to get the generic database structure and version.
https://github.com/axemclion/jquery-indexeddb/

Storage.name: Storage
Storage.description: This is a parent class used to store generic information about the database structure.

Api.name: Api
Api.description:
Directly interfaces the official Skritter API with the application.
For documentation regarding the API user the following link:
http://beta.skritter.com/api/v0/docs

params.name: clientId
params.description: description

params.name: clientSecret
params.description: description

Functions.name: Functions
Functions.description:
This class module contains numerous helper functions that are used throughout the application.
Additional functions used repeatedly shoud also be stored here. They are stored in the global Skritter namespace.

Mauler.name: Mauler
Mauler.description: Handles adjustments made when tweening from a user drawn squigs to

PinyinConverter.name: PinyinConverter
PinyinConverter.description: This is a utility class used to convert between number and tone mark pinyin notation.

Scheduler.name: Scheduler
Scheduler.description: A group of functions that can be used for scheduling items.

StrokeMap.name: StrokeMap
StrokeMap.description:
Returns an object that creates a spritesheet and its related mappings
to access character strokes.

return.description: True if the character contains the stroke
A container of sprites contained in the character
The total number of stroke in the character
Returns an array of objects

classitems.description:
Returns a collection of items that are considered to be active for studying. Items that
are considered active must have the part enabled, contained vocabs and not be banned.
classitems.name: filterActive

return.description: A new collection of filtered StudyItems
An array of contained item ids

classitems.description: Returns a unique set of vocabs that are contained in all of the items.
classitems.name: getContainedVocabs

classitems.description:
Returns items that are actively being studied and have a readiness value
greater than or equal to 1.
classitems.name: getItemsDue

classitems.description:
Returns the number of items that are currently due. Optionally it can include contained items for
those rune and tone items. Returning the contained items is probably a better representation of
the actual amount of work that needs to be done.
classitems.name: getDueCount

classitems.description:
Returns the item at the top of the sorted collection only including
items that are actively being studied.
classitems.name: getNext

return.description: The next item to be studied

classitems.description: Returns a random active study item.
classitems.name: getRandom

classitems.description:
Returns a filter array of reviews based if the attribute is equal to
the specified value.
classitems.name: filterBy

return.description: A new collection of filtered StudyReviews

classitems.description:
Returns a count of the current number of reviews and can optionally return
the number of contained reviews.
classitems.name: getCount

classitems.description: Returns the total time of all local reviews thats haven't been submitted in milliseconds.
classitems.name: getTime

return.description: Time in milliseconds

classitems.description: Plays an audio file using the native HTML5 audio element.
classitems.name: getAudio

classitems.description: Returns a stroke in the form of a sprite from the preloaded spritesheet.
classitems.name: getStroke

classitems.description: Returns the current instance of the stroke spritesheet.
classitems.name: getStrokeSpriteSheet

classitems.description: Loads the strokes as a spritesheet and returns a callback once they have been preloaded.
classitems.name: loadStrokes

return.description: description

classitems.description: Quickly caches all of the users current loaded data to storage and returns a callback.
classitems.name: cacheAllData

classitems.description: Gets the current active users properties and settings from the server then saves it.
classitems.name: fetch

classitems.description:
Adapts the stored values for animation speed into a format the application can use and
then returns it.
classitems.name: getAnimationSpeed

classitems.description: Gets the users current avatar and returns it as an image tag using base64 data.
classitems.name: getAvatar

return.description: Returns a base64 image tag

classitems.description:
Returns the last sync based on the current active language. This is needed so we don't
have to delete all of the data when switching languages.
classitems.name: getLastSync

classitems.description:
Adapts the stored values for weight into a format the application can use and
then returns it.
classitems.name: getOrderStrictness

classitems.description: A quicker way to get a setting from the user settings object.
classitems.name: getSetting

classitems.description: Returns an array of active study parts based on the current language being studied.
classitems.name: getStudyParts

classitems.description:
Returns the current style which really only applies to Chinese as both,
simplified or traditional.
classitems.name: getStyle

classitems.description:
Checks to see if the user is logged in by seeing if a token exists. This might not always work
in situations where the token as expired.
classitems.name: isLoggedIn

return.description: True or false pending the users login status

classitems.description:
Loads all of the data for the current active user into memory. For small to medium size accounts this is
fairly quick, but larger accounts might need to do loading in logical chunks.
classitems.name: loadAllData

classitems.description:
Performs a complete login, stores the authentication data and also fetches the users settings from the server.
If the statusCode returned is anything but 200 then it doesn't save, but returns the response message. It also creates or
opens the database for the user.
classitems.name: login

params.name: callback
params.description: Returns the authentication response data

classitems.description: Automatically logs the user out and returns them to the home screen when called.
classitems.name: logout

classitems.description: Sets the sync timestamp based on the active language and then returns it.
classitems.name: setLastSync

classitems.description: A quicker way to set the user settings object.
classitems.name: setSetting

classitems.description:
Syncs data with the server by getting changed items and posting reviews. If the account has never synced
this it initiates an full account download.
classitems.name: sync

params.name: name!~YUIDOC_LINE~!return
params.description: {Object}

params.name: callback
params.description: Returns once the table or tables have been cleared

params.name: tableName
params.description: An options parameter to clear a specific table

params.name: callback
params.description: Returns once the open database has been successfully deleted

params.name: tableName
params.description: The name of the table

params.name: key
params.description: The primary key or keys

params.name: callback
params.description: Returns a single row as an object

params.name: databaseName
params.description: The name of the database

params.name: callback
params.description: Returns the successfully created database object

params.name: item
params.description: An object to be saved or updated

params.name: items
params.description: An array of item objects

params.name: tableName
params.description: The name of the table

return.description: The object representing the specified table structure

params.name: tableName
params.description: The name of the table

params.name: excludeKeys
params.description: Toggle whether or not to include the keys in the results

return.description: An array of the field names

params.name: tableName
params.description: The name of the table

return.description: The array of keys in the table structure
A complete list of all the table names in the schema

params.name: html
params.description: HTML and text can be loaded as the diplay message

classitems.description: Used to start, stop and calculate accurate durations of time     .
Returns the current time displayed on the timer.
classitems.name: getTime

classitems.description: Returns the review time for the current lap.
classitems.name: getReviewTime

classitems.description: Returns the time that the current lap was started at.
classitems.name: getStartTime

classitems.description: Returns the thinking time for the current lap.
classitems.name: getThinkingTime

classitems.description:
Stops the timer but maintains the current lap. This is useful if the user opens the info tab or
if they leave the study page.
classitems.name: pause

classitems.description: Sets the review limit for the current lap.
classitems.name: setReviewLimit

classitems.description: Sets the thinking limit for the current lap.
classitems.name: setThinkingLimit

classitems.description: Directly set the offset for the timer. This is a bit redundant and probably won't be directly needed.
classitems.name: setOffset

classitems.description: Starts the timer if the lap limit hasn't been reached yet.
classitems.name: start

classitems.description: Stops the timer from running and resets the current lap.
classitems.name: stop

classitems.description: Updates the offset based on the gathered total study time for the day.
classitems.name: sync

classitems.description:
Bound to setInterval when the timer is running, but only allows render to be called
if a full second has passed.
classitems.name: update

classitems.description: Creates several containers used to organize different levels of display.
classitems.name: initLayers

classitems.description:
Disables all touch input on the canvas. This is most commonly used when a user has
already completed a problem and it needs grading.
classitems.name: disableInput

classitems.description:
Draws text to the canvas on the message layer. If a position isn't specified then
it defaults to the bottom center of the canvas.
classitems.name: displayMessage

classitems.description: Given a CanvasCharacter this will render the image to the canvas.

Draws the character to the background using the font rather than assembling
the character strokes.
classitems.name: drawCharacterFromText

classitems.description: The grid that fills the background of the canvas for rune prompts.
classitems.name: drawGrid

classitems.description:
Enables touch input and drawing on the canvas. It also handles the immediate ink
traced by the finger. It's important that this canvas doesn't use autoClear for
speed reasons and Cordova compatibility.
classitems.name: enableInput

classitems.description: Enables the view to fire events when the canvas has been touched.
classitems.name: triggerMouseDown

classitems.description: Enables the view to fire events when the canvas touch has been released.
classitems.name: triggerMouseUp

classitems.description: Handles the points returned when the user is finished with a stroke.
classitems.name: handleInputRecieved

classitems.description:
Handles the character if it is complete by applying the correct background glow
and then displaying the grading buttons.
classitems.name: handleCharacterComplete

classitems.description:
Handles the double tap event by displaying the character hint if it's
not finished yet.
classitems.name: handleDoubleTap

classitems.description:
Handles either the swipeleft or tap events by moving to the next if the
prompt has already been finished.
classitems.name: handleIfFinished

classitems.description:
Handles the grade selected event by passing the selected grade along and then
called the next character in the prompt.
classitems.name: handleGradeSelected

classitems.description: Handles the hold event by clearing the canvas and reseting the input.
classitems.name: handleHold

classitems.description:
Handles a complete stroke a trigger by the PromptCanvas. It also checks to see
if the character has been completed yet or not.
classitems.name: handleStrokeComplete

classitems.description:
Returns the next stroke in the character based on the order it should be written. It also
return the variation, so the matching background hint can be displayed.
classitems.name: getNextStroke

classitems.description: Returns the stroke highest possible stroke count out of all of the targets.
classitems.name: getTargetStrokeCount

classitems.description: Moves to the next item in the prompt for prompts containing multiple characters.
classitems.name: next

classitems.description:
Displays the answer for the user, which should be called after the prompt
has been completed.
classitems.name: showAnswer

classitems.description:
Displays the initial prompt for the user and should probably be renamed to
something a little less misleading than show hidden.
classitems.name: showHidden

classitems.description:
Toggles the language between Chinese and Japanese, syncs and then
reloads the page in the new language.
classitems.name: switchLanguage

classitems.description: Immediately saves a users selection after they have been toggled.
classitems.name: save

classitems.description: Loads and sets all of the user settings on the interface of the view.
classitems.name: load

classitems.description: Saves all the settings to the database.
classitems.name: save

classitems.description:
Loads the selected items into the study session. If nothing is set then
it'll just load the current active items.
classitems.name: loadPrompt

classitems.description: Returns the authenticated user and the token required for future calls to the API.
classitems.name: authenticateUser

classitems.description:
Returns the official date information of the account from the server. This is the safest way
to check the current time associated with the account.
classitems.name: getDateInfo

classitems.description:
Requests a specific batch from the server and returns the request id. Use the
getBatch function to get the requested data from the server.
classitems.name: requestBatch

classitems.description:
Returns an object with merged results based on a batch request. This is mainly used for
account downloads and for larger account can take a few minutes.
classitems.name: getBatch

classitems.description:
Returns an array of items based on requested ids. This is useful for syncing specific items that may
have errors or other issues.
classitems.name: getItems

params.name: ids
params.description: description

params.name: callback
params.description: description

classitems.description:
Returns specific progress stats that can be used for various things such as an actual
progress page or study time for the day from the server. To read more about the request parameters
check the API documentation.
classitems.name: getProgressStats

classitems.description:
Returns an array of review post errors from the server. If the offset is null then
it'll return all of the review errors.
classitems.name: getReviewErrors

classitems.description:
Returns an object containing character mappings from simplified to traditional Chinese.
Right now this is locally packaged with the application as it's not often updated.
classitems.name: getSimpTradMap

classitems.description:
Returns the SRSConfig values for the current active user. These should be updated
somewhat frequently to keep SRS calculations accurate.
classitems.name: getSRSConfigs

classitems.description:
Returns basic informatiom about a user or detailed information if its a request
for the current active user.
classitems.name: getUser

params.name: userId
params.description: description

params.name: callback
params.description: description

classitems.description:
Returns a high level list of lists available sorted by type. For longer sort groups
it might be nessesary to use pagination.
classitems.name: getVocabLists

classitems.description:
Returns a single vocab item with all of the stroke data. Useful for looking up vcoabs that
aren't actually associated with the user's items.
classitems.name: getVocab

classitems.description: Returns a single vocablist with section ids for further querying.
classitems.name: getVocabList

classitems.description: Returns an array of rows in s single list section.
classitems.name: getVocabListSection

classitems.description: Posts batches of reviews in groups of 500 and then returns an array of the posted objects.
classitems.name: postReviews

classitems.description: Creates the global Skritter namespace when the application first opened.
Loads the async utility into the Skriter namescape for easy usage.
classitems.name: loadAsync

classitems.description:
Loads the proper assets module depending on the load environment. Returns a
callback one the required assets have preloaded.
classitems.name: loadAssets

classitems.description:
Loads the storage adapter based on the current environment the application has been
loaded from.
classitems.name: loadStorage

classitems.description: Loads the timer and attempts to pull the current study time for the day from the server.
classitems.name: loadTimer

classitems.description:
This loads the user, data and also initiates the syncing process. In the future the callbacks should 
probably be cleaned up a bit.
classitems.name: loadUser

classitems.description: Initializing the appliation should only happen once when the application is first loaded.
classitems.name: initialize

classitems.description:
Reloading is used to initialize the application by only loading data that may have changed.
It skips loading large static assets from the media folder again.
classitems.name: reload

params.name: points
params.description: An array of point values

return.description: The angle formed by the first and last points

params.name: points
params.description: An array of point values

params.name: areaWidth
params.description: The width of the canvas area

params.name: areaHeight

params.name: pointRadius

The distance between the first and last points

params.name: start
params.description: The starting point of a line segment

params.name: end
params.description: The ending point of a line segment

params.name: point
params.description: Point to measure distance from the line segment

return.description: The distance from the point and line segment

params.name: milliseconds
params.description: If true then the returned time will include milliseconds

return.description: The current unix time

params.name: text
params.description: The text to be masked

params.name: value
params.description: The value in the text to mask

params.name: mask
params.description: The mask to apply to the contained values

return.description: The text with the specied value masked

params.name: text
params.description: The text requiring padding

params.name: value
params.description: The value to be applied as padding

params.name: size
params.description: The number of spaces of padding to be applied

classitems.description: The object that contains the direct mapping of pinyin using numbers to tone.
classitems.name: mapping

classitems.description: Uses regex to and loops through the string replacing all of the matching tones with numbers.
classitems.name: number

params.name: text
params.description: The text that needs to be converted

return.description: The string with replaced values

classitems.description: Uses regex to and loops through the string replacing all of the matching numbers with tones.
classitems.name: tone

params.name: text
params.description: The text that needs to be converted

return.description: The string with replaced values
Returns the current router instance

classitems.description: Returns a calculated interval based on the grade and other details about the item.
classitems.name: getInterval
